name: Small Life (sipsop)
description:
This game was made for the Extra Credits Jam.

It can be played entirely. You can travel, meet people, build relationship, buy some small things, attend to school, work and win money.

There are tons of features, and some wasn't implemented in this version because time was running pretty fast.

Just click on each object to interact with it, there is no heavy science on gameplay and i hope you enjoy the game mechanics.

If you like it, please recommend and don't hesitate to give me your feedback.
